name: Snowbreak
description:
The plot of the game:

The demon came out of hell and froze the earth! Now we are going to fight the demon. After defeating the demon's helper, the snow melted and nature woke up ...

Control:

keyboard + mouse (screenshot clock or press a key in the game)
